in some sense, calling zec "encrypted bitcoin" makes sense, in that it has the same tokenomics and SoV appeal but is private

in some sense though, it will be meaningfully different

how I first got involved in zcash was actually from a few friends asking me to read over the new scalability upgrade that was proposed, called project tachyon

this has similar roots to zk compression on solana (though is quite different) and should in theory scale the movement of ZEC throughout the network in a way that BTC couldn't without relying on L2s

I would expect an order of magnitude or two improvement in TPS

(this is also why I had both anatoly and the zec engineers on an episode of lightspeed 1.5y ago, so that toly could grill them on the perf aspects)

so while the comparison is useful to meme, if you start from first principles, it could be more of a "p2p digital cash but private" equivalent since it can be used at scale

zec is now on solana

if you used solswap dot org or near intents via zashi to bridge from/to zcash, you can either bridge back and LP

ii) coin was up 900% (and is now up ~525%), since shielded pool didn't budge, obviously a lot of tradoooors rotating into perceived undervalued majors as they realize market might be shakier than previously thought

one thing to note is that winklevoss dat purchased about 1.5% of the supply at ~$280 avg and their goal is 5% of supply

one thing forsure is that the asset has fundamentally reclassified itself, it was barely in the top 100 before, now it's going to always content for top 10 at minimum
